thread.title_full: Ground News - Mavericks Surf Rally Underway as 30-Plus-Foot Waves Pummel Half Moon Bay

author: SFist
title: Ground News - Mavericks Surf Rally Underway as 30-Plus-Foot Waves Pummel Half Moon Bay
text:
Summary by SFist The most dangerous surfing conditions of the year are also the most beloved surfing conditions of the year for the world’s most elite surfers, who’ve descended on Half Moon Bay for the legendary, unscheduled Mavericks surfing festivities. We noted earlier this morning that high surf and flood warnings are in effect today for pretty much the entire Bay Area coast. The Chronicle points out that massively dangerous waves are making the ocean incred… Share menu More
